PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableLadderSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An open carrier segment on which cables are carried on a ladder structure.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal length of the segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal width of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the segment

PropertyDef.Name: LadderConfiguration
PropertyDef.Definition: Description of the configuration of the ladder structure used.
